            Bio
            Matheus Cordeiro is an international student from Brazil, who is studying his Master in Business Administration at Cal Poly Pomona. With his bachelor’s in Chemical Engineering, he uses his analytical skills, combined with his previous experience in marketing, to provide important and relevant information to the decision-makers.
            At this moment, he is looking to gain professional experience in different types of analytical areas related to data (data analysis, finance analyst, marketing analyst, etc). He has a passion for analyzing data and problem solving, and how it can facilitate innovation.
            
            
            Education
            California Polytechnic State University Pomona | Pomona, CA
            Master in Business Analytics | August 2021 - August 2022 (expected)
            Sao Paulo State University (USP) | Lorena, Brazil
            B.S. in Chemical Engineering | January 2015 - December 2020
            
            
            Experience
            Center for Customer Insights and Digital Marketing | Data Analytics Lead | March 2022 - Present
            Center for Customer Insights and Digital Marketing | Junior Data Scientist | September 2021 - March 2022
            DuPont | Marketing Specialist | January 2021 - July 2021
            DuPont | Marketing Strategy Intern LATAM | January 2020 - December 2020
            BASF | Global Laboratory Intern | August 2018 - December 2019
